name: Zombie Garden
description:
This game is 2d zombie-shooter where you have to kill all walking deads to survive. You should also protect your house, because your girlfriend Claudia is hiding there. If zombies will destroy at least one wall you will loose your lovely woman.

STORY:
It was a usual day when you heard some strange noise from the street. You looked out a window and saw somebody slowly walking to you house. You decided to go out with a rifle and meet a stranger.
